definitions.title: vb. Pi.
definitions.body: test, try (NH id., Pi.; Targum Pa. [[נַסִּי]]; Syr. Pa. nasiy; cf. Eth. mansat: temptation);—
test, try (syn. [[בחן]]), abs. 1Sa 17:39 (a sword); c. [[בְּ]] Ju 7:39, Ec 2:1; c. acc. Da 1:12, Da 1:14; acc. + [[בְּ]] 1Ki 10:1 = 2Ch 9:1, Ec 7:23.
attempt, assay, try to do a thing, c. Inf. De 4:34, De 28:56; c. acc. Job 4:2 (venture a word).
test, try, prove, tempt [but not in modern sense of the word: v. Dr:De 6:16; PsalmPsalm 453, 483]

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: God tests or proves Abr. Ge 22:1 (E), Isr. Ex 15:25, Ex 20:20 (E), Ex 16:4 (J), De 8:2, De 8:16, De 13:4; c. [[בְּ]] Ju Jdg 2:22, Jdg 3:1, Jdg 3:4; tribe of Levi De 33:8 (poem); Hezekiah 2Ch 32:31; psalmist Ps 26:2.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: Isr. tests, or tries God: Ex 17:2, Ex 17:7, Nu 14:22 (J), De 6:16, Ps 78:18, Ps 78:41, Ps 78:56, Ps 95:9, Ps 106:14; so Ahaz, Is 7:12.
